<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfexpression-2">DwarfExpression</a></>}>
Base class containing the logic for constructing DWARF expressions independently of whether they are emitted into a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> or into a .debug&#95;loc entry. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfexpression-2/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void DIEDwarfExpression::disableTemporaryBuffer ()"
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Disable emission to the temporary buffer.

This does not commit data in the temporary buffer to the main output.

### enableTemporaryBuffer() {#ab81c0fd4b103a0f7b18b186222784b7d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void DIEDwarfExpression::enableTemporaryBuffer ()"
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Start emitting data to the temporary buffer.

The data stored in the temporary buffer can be committed to the main output using <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfexpression/#ae9f7bf56f59e4092017760acc2cd2f6c">commitTemporaryBuffer()</a>.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/dwarfexpression-h/#l00359">359</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/dwarfexpression-h">DwarfExpression.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/dwarfunit-cpp/#l00065">65</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/dwarfunit-cpp">DwarfUnit.cpp</a>.
